nslj.src.display.j3d
Class BodySegment

java.lang.Object
  nslj.src.display.j3d.NslObject3d
      nslj.src.display.j3d.BodySegment

public class BodySegment
extends NslObject3d

A limb of the body including the joint connecting it to its parent limb and a set of controllers - one for each degree of freedom (DOF)
